text: Dick Kotanen (born Eino Richard Erwin Kotanen; November 18, 1925 – September 11, 2011) was a Canadian professional ice hockey defenceman who played in one National Hockey League game for the New York Rangers during the 1950–51 NHL season. Kotanen died on November 9th 2011. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey defencemen Category:Eastern Hockey League players Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:New York Rangers players Category:Sportspeople from Thunder Bay
title: Dick Kotanen
